data.title: Fraternity and Sorority Affairs - Division of Student Affairs
data.text:
A “recognized” fraternity or sorority is one that is in good standing with Rutgers. All recognized fraternities and sororities have worked hard to earn their official status. These organizations have the privilege of using college facilities and equipment, tabling, posting, holding meetings and/or programs on campus, inducting new members that will be recognized by the university, and participating in campus events such as the Involvement Fair, Bed Races, and Dance Marathon.

To report technical issues with this website, contact the ITS Help Desk at 848-932-7248 or its@echo.rutgers.edu
